name: Eco-Friendly Island
title: Lowest CO2 Emissions from Waste
description: Mauritius boasts one of the lowest CO2 emissions from waste in the world, with a mere 0.0001 Mt CO2e recorded in 2023. This highlights the nation's commitment to sustainable waste management practices.

name: Minimal Military Spending
title: Lowest Military Expenditure as a Percentage of Government Spending
description: In 2023, Mauritius allocated only 0.52% of its general government expenditure to military spending, showcasing its focus on peace and stability over military expansion.

name: Aid from Sweden
title: Net Bilateral Aid from Sweden
description: In 2021, Mauritius received $9,999.99 in net bilateral aid from Sweden, reflecting international support and cooperation.

name: Limited Unemployment Support
title: Low Benefit Incidence to Poorest Quintile
description: In 2017, only 3.85% of unemployment benefits and active labor market programs were directed towards the poorest quintile in Mauritius, indicating a need for more inclusive social support systems.
